content: these socks knit up in a wink and actually stay on teeny-tiny baby feet snug enough to be cozy ribbed to make it easier to stretch over those wiggly baby feet and a long fold-over cuff that stops them from sliding off the toe shaping is wide to match the shape of real baby feet they are knit top-down knit a few sets and make your favorite wee one s feet very happy i will likely add a 6 month size when my little guy outgrows these ones
